mapper.select: SELECT report_id, reporter_name, reporter_phone, car_reg_num, car_model, defect_detail, is_reviewed as reviewed, TO_CHAR(reported_at, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') as reported_at FROM CAR_RECALL WHERE report_id = #{report_id}
mapper.update: UPDATE CAR_RECALL SET is_reviewed = #{reviewed, javaType=boolean, jdbcType=NUMERIC} WHERE report_id = #{report_id}
